trans-unit.source: Represents a workflow that executes activities sequentially.
trans-unit.target: Представляет рабочий процесс, который выполняет действия последовательно.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The SequentialWorkflowActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> with `Initialized` and `Completed` events for optional processing of parameters.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]— SequentialWorkflowActivity <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>с `Initialized` и `Completed` событий для необязательной обработки параметров.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>

trans-unit.source: This makes it particularly useful as a top-level activity when you design sequential-style workflows.
trans-unit.target: Это облегчает особенно полезны в качестве действия верхнего уровня при разработке рабочих процессов последовательного типа.

trans-unit.source: The SequentialWorkflowActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the SequentialWorkflowActivity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: — SequentialWorkflowActivity <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, что означает SequentialWorkflowActivity может содержать другие действия.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity"></xref> class by using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Инициализирует новый экземпляр <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity"> </xref> , используя имя действия.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
Occurs when the workflow has finished.
To be added.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed"></xref> event.
To be added.
Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> in which dynamic updates can be made in the workflow, when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает или задает <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> при какие динамические обновления могут быть выполнены в рабочем процессе, при переопределении в производном классе.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> that identifies when dynamic updates can be made.
trans-unit.target: Объект <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> , определяющее, когда могут быть выполнены динамические обновления.

trans-unit.source: Runs the workflow.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> at the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity"></xref> at the end of the requested operation.
Occurs when the workflow is initialized.
To be added.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Initialized"></xref> event.
To be added.
Raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.CompletedEvent"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
executionContext is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: executionContextявляется пустой ссылкой ( в Visual Basic).
